Verses: 1 ezhu Kalasangalaiyudaiya Andha Ezhu Thoodharil Oruvan Vandhu Ennode Pesi: Nee Vaa, Thiralaana Thanneergalmel Utkaarndhirukkira Magaa Vesiyode Boomiyin Raajaakkal Vesiththanampanninaargale, Avaludaiya Vesiththanamaagiya Madhuvaal Boomiyin Kudigalum Verikondirundhaargale;
2 avalukku Varugira Aakkinaiyai Unakkuk Kaanbippen Endru Solli;

3 aavikkul Ennai Vanaandharaththirkuk Konduponaan. Appozhudhu Ezhu Thalaigalaiyum Paththuk Kombugalaiyum Udaiyadhum Thooshanamaana Naamangalaal Niraindhadhumaana Sivappuniramulla Mirugaththinmel Oru Sthiree Eriyirukkak Kanden.

4 andha Sthiree Raththaamparamum Sivappaana Aadaiyundhariththu, Ponninaalum Raththinangalinaalum Muththukkalinaalum Singaarikkappattu, Than Vesiththanamaagiya Aruvaruppugalaalum Asuththaththaalum Niraindha Porpaaththiraththaith Than Kaiyile Pidiththirundhaal.
5 melum, Iragasiyam, Magaa Baabilon, Vesigalukkum Boomiyilulla Aruvaruppugalukkum Thaaiennum Naamam Aval Netriyil Ezhudhiyirundhadhu.
6 andha Sthiree Parisuththavaangalin Raththaththinaalum, Yesuvinudaiya Saatchigalin Raththaththinaalum Verikondirukkiradhaik Kanden; Avalaik Kandu Naan Migavum Aachchariyappatten.

7 appozhudhu, Thoodhanaanavan Ennai Nokki: En Aachchariyappadugiraai? Indha Sthireeyinudaiya Ragasiyaththaiyum, Ezhu Thalaigalaiyum Paththuk Kombugalaiyumudaiyadhaai Ivalaich Sumakkira Mirugaththinudaiya Ragasiyaththaiyum Unakkuch Sollugiren.

8 nee, Kanda Mirugam Munne Irundhadhu, Ippozhudhu Illai; Adhu Paadhaalaththilirundhu Erivandhu, Naasamadaiyappogiradhu. Ulagaththotramudhal Jeevapusthagaththil Perezhudhappattiraadha Boomiyin Kudigal, Irundhadhum, Iraamarponadhum, Ini Iruppadhumaayirukkira Mirugaththaippaarththu Aachchariyappaduvaargal.
9 gnaanamulla Manam Idhile Vilangum. Andha Ezhu Thalaigalum Andha Sthiree Utkaarndhirukkira Ezhu Malaigalaam.
10 avargal Ezhu Raajaakkalaam; Ivargalil Aindhuper Vizhundhaargal, Oruvan Irukkiraan, Matravan Innum Varavillai; Varumpodhu Avan Konjakkaalam Thariththirukkavendum.
11 irundhadhum Iraadhadhumaagiya Mirugame Ettaavadhaanavanum, Avvezhilirundhu Thondrugiravanum, Naasamadaiyappogiravanumaayirukkiraan.
12 nee Kanda Paththuk Kombugalum Paththu Raajaakkalaam; Ivargal Innum Raajyam Peravillai; Ivargal Mirugaththudanekooda Orumani Neramalavum Raajaakkalpola Adhikaaram Petrukkollugiraargal.
13 ivargal Ore Yosanaiyullavargal; Ivargal Thangal Vallamaiyaiyum Adhigaaraththaiyum Mirugaththirkuk Koduppaargal.

14 ivargal Aattukkuttiyaanavarudane Yuththampannuvaargal, Aattukkuttiyaanavar Karththaadhikarththarum Raajaadhi Raajaavumaayirukkirapadiyaal Avargalai Jeyippaar; Avarodukooda Irukkiravargal Azhaikkappattavargalum Therindhukollappattavargalum Unmaiyullavargalumaayirukkiraargal Endraan.
15 pinnum Avan Ennai Nokki: Andha Vesi Utkaarndhirukkira Thanneergalaik Kandaaye; Avaigal Janangalum Koottangalum Jaadhigalum Baashaikkaararumaam.
16 nee Mirugaththinmel Kanda Paththukkombugalaanavargal Andha Vesiyaippagaiththu, Avalaip Paazhum Nirvaanamumaakki, Avaludaiya Maamsaththaip Patchiththu, Avalai Neruppinaal Sutteriththuppoduvaargal.

17 dhevan Thammudaiya Vaarththaigal Niraiverumalavum, Avargal Thamadhu Yosanaiyai Niraivetrugiradharkum, Ore Yosanaiyullavargalaayirundhu, Thangal Raajyaththai Mirugaththirkuk Kodukkiradharkum Avargaludaiya Irudhayangalai Evinaar.
18 nee Kanda Sthireeyaanaval Boomiyin Raajaakkalmel Raajyabaarampannugira Magaa Nagarameyaam Endraan.
